response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $15,000 to me. Considering its worth to you stands at $8,000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
